Title: Always the Cowboy
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Jonathan Tropper (teleplay by), Jonathan Tropper (story by), David Schickler (story by)
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Hood rushes Ana to the hospital after finding her badly beaten and suffering. Rabbit comes to Banshee. An injured and distraught Ana rushes to find her children. However, she is too late to prevent Rabbit from kidnapping Max.
